lines.text: There's a room just down the hall from McLeod's office where grown men play a game. It's a bit like Monopoly, only more people get hurt. There's no good and no bad. The object is not to win, but not to lose - and the only rule is to stay in the game.
You're beautiful Jean, but sometimes you have the bad breath of priests.
Joy, baby. A C-note? My mother's dead, so who do l have to kill?
Toasting himself and Zharckov "Here's to dinosaurs".

[speaking of his cats]
They were bred to be degenerate.
